short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop your youtube videos into a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouPop adds a button on the bottom right corner of youtube web players. When you click it, it opens the video on a new compact window allowing you to maximize screen real estate when watching videos on youtube.
